author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Globert is the first of the Series 4 Mixels of the Glowkies Tribe.This tribe has a halloween theme, and each member has some glow in the dark parts. The white around Globert's black eye is his.

Globert is fun, he has limited articulation (feet and wings) and his head rocks to open/close his mouth. The earth blue wings are also a great part.

Quick build time 3 minutes. Globert does have a lower than average number of pieces.

I like the Glowkies; Earth Blue is a really good colour, the Aqua 'cheese wedges' are a good quantity of a useful decorative part in a rare colour. I also like the Halloween theme. The glow in the dark pieces are fun, and the main focus of the tribes theme.

The limited articulation does limit their posability and playability.
